body: Man had a post-nut clarity or something

So said "Wise man" certainly doesn't understand what love actually is 
Posted in:
273903

Attraction is the chemical reaction that compels us to breed. Excessive attraction can sometimes induce the feeling known as "love at first sight". Infatuation is what develops quickly through their personality, habits, and otherwise that you like, increasing your attraction inevitably. "Love" is the bond you create on top of all that. Unless through bad communication between both parties, cheating, lack of respect, lack of empathy and sympathy, causing You wear down that bond, there shouldn't be an issue. But if there never was love in the first place, just attraction and infatuation, then of course it will fail.
@Aelth you need to have sex brother

Love sure is stupid, a wise man once said "What people calls "love" is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed. It hits hard, then it slowly fades, leaving you stranded in a failing marriage. Your parents did it and Your probably going to do it."
Good, whores don't deserve love.

To all you who are missing the point. Read pages 1, 2 and 19. MC's belittling a classmate who is doing the same as her; MC patted herself on the back because there weren't any rumors about herself, unlike her classmate, who bought a flashy bag with her money, and has rumors running in class. Yet, MC is the one who falls to temptation first and ends up destroying her arrangement because emotions get the better of her. In a way, her classmate is indeed dumber, but it's because of that that she doesn't fall like MC does. So, this is a case of dumb slut VS girl-who-doesn't-think-she's-a-dumb-slut-herself.
